titleStmt.title: Foure sermons preached at the court vpon seuerall occasions, by the late reuerend and learned diuine, Doctor Senhouse, L. Bishop of Carlile
titleStmt.author: Senhouse, Richard, d. 1626.
Blechynden, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Humphrey Lownes] for R. Dawlman, at the signe of the Bible neere the great Conduit in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
